page.title: 10ISLAMIC COLLEGE-RAMSBOTTOM
page.content: Darul Uloom means "House of Knowledge". It is an{Islamic College } for 300 boys aged between 12 and 22 years old.There are only 2 of these colleges in the country and although 70% of the{students}are from England,others are from Canada, Africa, West Indies and Bangladesh. All the students are multi-lingual as lessons are in Urdu, Arabic and English.There is a waiting list for places and students have to pass an aptitude test.Parents pay fees of about Â£15 a week. The day begins with prayers before sunrise. The morning is devoted to {Religious Education}and the afternoon to secular subjects.Free time is spent playing sport. students have to memorise the{Koran,} pray 5 times a day and fast during Ramadan.
